channel.title: Week In Memes - What's Going Viral in India?
channel.description: Recent content on Week In Memes - What's Going Viral in India?

item.title: Saath Nibhana Saathiya memes
item.description:
Origin

Instagram user Yashraj Mukhate posted a video from the popular TV show Saath Nibhana Saathiya with his music and some autotuning. It went viral and spawned several memes with the tagline, “Rasode mein kaun tha?”

item.title: Paatal Lok memes
item.description:
Origin

Amazon Prime web series Paatal Lok premiered on May 15, 2020. Created by Anushka Sharma’s production house, Clean Slate Films, the show has received great praise from viewers and specifically from meme makers.

item.title: Hanuman lifts the Sanjeevani Booti mountain memes
item.description:
Origin

Another Ramayana meme has become viral. This time it is the scene where Hanuman carries the mountain with Sanjeevani Booti.

item.title: Welcome Movie memes
item.description:
Origin

The movie, Welcome, released in 2007 is one of the funniest Bollywood movies ever. Nana Patekar plays the underworld don Uday Shetty, Anil Kapoor his sidekick Majnu. Their attempt at reformation to impress Mallika Sherawat as well as to get their sister, Katrina Kaif married to Akshay Kumar and his “good family” leads to some hilarious scenes.

item.title: Ramayana Memes
item.description:
Origin

The government of India’s solution to make the lockdown caused by Coronavirus is to bring back old TV shows from the 80s and 90s.

Prakash Javdekar, the minister for Information and Broadcasting announced on March 27 that Ramayana would be aired everyday at 9 am and 9 pm on DD National. The 2 Hindu epics - Ramayana and Mahabharata - were the most popular shows then and were the most anticipated ones for a generation that grew up watching them.

item.title: Sooryavanshi Trailer memes
item.description:
Origin

Rohit Shetty’s next movie is wait for it … a cop thriller. This time Akshay Kumar plays the title character ‘Sooryavanshi’. Watch the trailer here:

item.title: Love Aaj Kal Trailer Memes
item.description:
Origin

The trailer for Imtiaz Ali’s next movie titled Love Aaj Kal (yes the same title as his 2009 movie) released on Jan 16, 2020. Watch the trailer here:

item.title: Week 017 - Siddhant Chaturvedi, Virat Kohli, Malang Trailer
item.description: New Year, New Memes. Ananya Panday became the subject of the year’s first meme at a recent Roundtable hosted by Rajeev Masand… and this is just the beginning.

item.title: Virat Kohli Pitch Inspection memes
item.description:
Origin

On Jan 5, 2020, India was scheduled to play Sri Lanka in a T20 match at Guwahati’s Barsapara Cricket Stadium but rain played spoilsport and the match was washed out. That didn’t stop Twitter from making memes though.

item.title: Malang Trailer memes
item.description:
Origin

The trailer for Aditya Roy Kapur and Disha Patani starrer, Malang released on Jan 6, 2020. Watch the trailer here:

item.title: Siddhant Chaturvedi Ananya Panday Nepotism reply memes
item.description:
Origin

In a “Newcomers Roundtable” hosted by Rajeev Masand on Dec 31, 2019, Siddhant Chaturvedi gave a witty reply to Ananya Panday’s comments on nepotism.

item.title: Modi Sunglasses memes
item.description:
Origin

The Prime Minister of India, Narendra Modi, traveled to Kozhikode, Kerala to watch the solar eclipse. However, according to his tweet, clouds blocked his view.

item.title: Amit Shah Chronology memes
item.description:
Origin

In an old video, Amit Shah is seen explaining the order in which CAB and NRC will be implemented. Watch the video here:

item.title: Piyush Goyal Running memes
item.description:
Origin

On Dec 04, 2019 Piyush Goyal was spotted running towards the parliament as he was presumably late. Reporter Payal Mehta captured him in his sprint. Catch the moment here:

item.title: Rohit Sharma Catch memes
item.description:
Origin

On Nov 22, the first day of the “Pink Ball Test”, Mominul Haque was dismissed caught in the slips by Rohit Sharma off Umesh Yadav’s bowling. Watch the catch here:

item.title: Thalaivi First Look memes
item.description:
Origin

The Jayalalitha biopic directed by Vijay and starring Kangana Ranaut released its first look on Nov 23, 2019. The movie will be made in Hindi, Telugu and Tamil and is slated for release on June 26, 2020. Watch the first look here:

item.title: Week 016 - Thalaivi, Rohit Sharma Catch
item.description:
Yo! I’m back with another edition of week in memes. While I haven’t sent out many emails recently, I have written more articles. The website has also gone through a major redesign with a new home page, a search feature a new way to support the site. Check out the support page

Nothing major has happened in politics this week so… Wait. What happened? Let this fresh meme explain:

item.title: Ramdev Lifts Arnab memes
item.description:
Origin

On Nov 10, Baba Ramdev, the founder of Patanjali, appeared on Republic TV for an interview with Arnab Goswami. Watch the video here:

item.title: Panipat Trailer memes
item.description:
Origin

The trailer for the Ashutosh Gowariker-directed movie Panipat released on Nov 4, 2019. The movie stars Arjun Kapoor, Kriti Sanon in leading roles with Sanjay Dutt as the antagonist. Watch the trailer here:

item.title: Ravi Shastri Napping memes
item.description:
Origin

Ravi Shastri, head coach of the Indian Cricket team, was seen napping during the Day 3 of the match between India and South Africa at Ranchi leading to memes like:

item.title: Dabangg 3 Trailer memes
item.description:
Origin

The Dabangg 3 trailer released on Oct 23, 2019. The latest edition of the Dabangg movie is directed by Prabhu Deva and is the debut movie for Saiee Manjrekar (Mahesh Manjrekar’s daughter). Watch the trailer here:

item.title: Week 015 - Back with more memes and features
item.description: Hello! I’ve been away from the blog for the last few weeks but I’m back now. If you haven’t seen it yet, there’s a new homepage design and a search bar now. It’s a quick but slightly hacky implementation of elastic search. If you know a better way, hit me up ^_^.

item.title: Paragliding Video memes
item.description:
Origin

A video of a man paragliding in Manali has gone viral. Watch the video here:

item.title: Dream Girl Trailer memes
item.description:
Origin

The trailer for Ayushmann Khuarrana’s next movie Dream Girl released on Aug 12, 2019.

Watch the trailer here:

item.title: Sacred Games 2 memes
item.description:
Origin

The much awaited Sacred Games Season 2 is finally out and as was the case with Season 1 it is full of catchy dialogues that make for great memes.

item.title: Saaho Trailer memes
item.description:
Origin

Trailer for the movie, Saaho, starring Prabhas, Shraddha Kapoor and Neil Nitin Mukesh released on Aug 10, 2019.

Watch the trailer here:

item.title: Modi Man vs Wild memes
item.description:
Origin

On Jul 28, 2019, Bear Grylls announced that Narendra Modi, the Prime Minister of India, will be appearing on his show, Man vs. Wild.

item.title: Week 014 - Mission Mangal and Mature Bag
item.description: With the World Cup, behind us, it’s been a slow week. So slow that a random TikTok video about a bag went viral.

item.title: Mission Mangal Trailer memes
item.description:
Origin

The trailer for Akshay Kumar’s latest movie, Mission Mangal released on Jul 18, 2019. The movie is based on Indian Space Research Organisation (ISRO)‘s successful Mars Orbiter Mission (aka Mangalyaan) carried out in 2013-14

Watch the trailer here:

item.title: War Teaser memes
item.description:
Origin

Teaser for the action movie, War, starring Tiger Shroff and Hrithik Roshan released on Jul 14, 2019. This was just a few days after the release of Super 30 in which Hrithik Roshan plays a poor teacher in Bihar. The contrast in the 2 roles was perfect for memes such as this:

item.title: Mature Bag memes
item.description:
Origin

On July 10, 2019, TikTok user @style_centric posted a video with recommendations on “How to look attractive” in college. One of the suggestions was to wear a “Mature Bag”. You can buy Mature Bag on Amazon

item.title: Chahal Chilling memes
item.description:
Origin

During the India vs. Sri Lanka match in the Cricket World Cup 2019 on Jul 06, 2019 at Leeds, Yuzvendra Chahal was seen resting leisurely beyond the boundary rope as India cruised to a victory.

item.title: Sacred Games 2 Trailer memes
item.description:
Origin

The trailer for the much-awaited second season of Netflix series Sacred Games (based on a book by the same name by Vikram Chandra) was finally released on Jul 08, 2019. The second season is set to go live on Netflix on Aug 15, 2019.

Watch the trailer here:

item.title: India Orange Jersey memes
item.description:
Origin

On Jun 28, 2019, BCCI released a new jersey that the Indian cricket team would wear for the Cricket World Cup 2019.

item.title: Week 013 - Bleed Orange, Chahal and Sacred Games 2
item.description: India might be out of the world cup but the memes live on!

item.title: Sarfaraz Yawn memes
item.description:
Origin

During the India vs. Pakistan match in the ICC Cricket World Cup 2019 on Jun 16, 2019, Sarfaraz Ahmed, the captain and wicketkeeper for Pakistan was seen yawning. In an otherwise tense match, this was a light moment which made its way to memes.

item.title: Imran Tahir Celebration memes
item.description:
Origin

Imran Tahir, the South African spinner, is known for running wildly after taking a wicket. When that happened against Pakistan in the ICC Cricket World Cup 2019 match on Jun 23, 2019, Pakistan fans on Twitter showed how far he could go running after a wicket.

item.title: Angry Pakistan Cricket Fan memes
item.description:
Origin

During the ICC Cricket World Cup match between Pakistan and Australia on June 12, 2019 after David Warner was dropped by Asif Ali at third man, the cameras panned to a very distraught looking Pakistan fan in the crowd.

item.title: Week 012 - All about Pakistan at the World Cup
item.description: The ICC Cricket World Cup is in full swing and has given some great meme material so far… thanks in large part to the most inconsistent team (as usual) Pakistan.

item.title: Akshay Kumar Scheme memes
item.description:
Origin

Akshay Kumar Schemeposting is a Facebook group that is focused on memes featuring Akshay Kumar. The scheme in Schemeposting is based on Akhsay Kumar’s character in the 2007 movie, Phir Hera Pheri (sequel to Hera Pheri). In the movie, Raju (Akshay Kumar) falls for a money-making scheme and then tries to sell similar schemes to other gullible people like Rajpal Yadav as shown in this template:

item.title: Week 011 - Elections and JCB
item.description: The elections are finally over that means Vivek Oberoi’s Narendra Modi biopic can be released… But instead of watching the movie, Indians prefer watching JCB machines dig. Seriously.

item.title: JCB memes
item.description:
Origin

To be honest, no one really knows. What we do know is that Indians are fascinated by the yellow digging machines, specifically the ubiquitous ones sold under the JCB brand. It’s like mineral water is ‘Bisleri’ or photocopy is ‘Xerox’ in India, these machines are now JCB.

On May 27, 2019, Twitter users almost spontaneously started making memes about this phenomenon of Indians gathering to watch JCB machines at work. Probably it’s the lull between 2 big events - Indian elections and the World Cup - that is the cause of this completely random trend. But, the term #JCBKiKhudai was trending on top in India and made to Twitter Moments and even the official JCB handle had to respond:

item.title: Modi Cloud vs. Radar memes
item.description:
Origin

In an exclusive interview to The News Nation, Prime Minister Narendra Modi was asked about the Balakot Air Strikes against Pakistan. He mentioned that bad weather and clouds in particular could help planes hide from radars. What followed was memes about this statement on how clouds benefit in all other walks of life such as…

item.title: Priyanka Chopra Met Gala memes
item.description:
Origin

The Met Gala theme for this year was ‘camp’ which is basically a shout out to the subreddit r/ATBGE - Awful Taste But Great Execution. Priyanka Chopra true to theme was went in a silver dress and afro-ish hairstyle. That was enough to call in comparisons with the only other guy with the same hairstyle Indians are familiar with… Lasith Malinga

item.title: Week 010 - RIP Grumpy Cat, Vivek Oberoi, Radars and Met Gala
item.description: First up, we say good bye to a beloved meme, Grumpy Cat. She was 7 years old. RIP :(

item.title: Pooja What Is This Behaviour memes
item.description:
Origin

The Pooja Misrra and Shonali Nagrani fight on Bigg Boss has come back as a viral video.

Watch the fight:

item.title: Sunny Deol BJP memes
item.description:
Origin

On Apr 23, 2019, Sunny Deol joined the BJP. Indians love Bollywood and politics. So this crossover episode was the perfect opporunity for Twitter to bring out all of Sunny Deol’s iconic dialogues and scenes. Like this one from Damini

item.title: Bharat Trailer memes
item.description:
Origin

Salman Khan’s latest Eid release, Bharat, released its trailer on Apr 22, 2019. The film has a starcast of Salman Khan, Katrina Kaif and Jackie Shroff.

Watch the trailer here:

item.title: Depressed Daya CID memes
item.description:
Origin

Images of Daya, from the TV show CID shown sad at a beach started appearing as memes on Apr 26, 2019

item.title: Week 009 - Bharat Trailer, Sunny Deol in BJP and Depressed Daya
item.description: It’s almost Ramazan and that means only one thing - a Salman Khan movie is about to be released. This Eid, Salman Khan will be playing ‘Bharat’ in the movie of the same name alongside Katrina Kaif. In other news, Sunny Deol joined BJP and Daya from CID is the Desi version of Pablo Escobar Waiting meme.

item.title: Cute Pathan Kid Ahmad Shah memes
item.description: Origin A kid from Pakistan has recently become a viral sensation for his video. Watch the video here: His name is Ahmad Shah and some are calling him the cutest kid on the internet and I can’t disagree. 😍 Sorry, Taimur. He has almost 200k likes on Facebook. He originally appeared in a viral video saying “Ye mera basta hai” (Translation: This is my bag) which then led to him appearing on national TV in Karachi on the show ‘Good Morning Pakistan’ on ARY Digital with Nida Yasir.

item.title: Tiktok Ban
item.description:
TikTok Ban

On Apr 17, 2019, the popular video sharing app TikTok was taken off Google Play and Apple’s App Store following a court order. The app was popular in India, especially among young internet users whose first language was not English. While some users found the content on the app ‘cringeworthy’, it was nevertheless popular.

item.title: Student of the Year 2 Trailer memes
item.description:
Origin

The Student of The Year 2 trailer, starring Tiger Shroff (Jackie Shroff’s son), Tara Sutaria and Ananya Panday (Chunky Panday’s daughter) released on April 11, 2019 showing the ‘students’ doing everything other than studying like fighting, swimming, running and … having a threesome? Screw Hogwarts, I want to go to this school.

item.title: Week 008 - Student of The Year 2, TikTok Ban
item.description: With Game of Thrones taking over the meme space, there isn’t much Desi stuff happening. So a slow week this time with just the Star Kid Student of the Year 2 trailer and we say good bye to a beloved app…

item.title: Kalank Trailer memes
item.description:
Origin

The Kalank trailer released on Apr 03, 2019. While the cast and plot might be completely non-relatable, the dialogues were.

item.title: Vineet Sharda Kamal memes
item.description:
Origin

BJP leader while campaigning in Meerut for Lok Sabha candidate Rajendra Agrawal on Apr 02, 2019 made it very clear which symbol he wanted people to vote on by saying Kamal (lotus, the BJP symbol). Honestly it sounded better than Gucci Gang.

item.title: Vikrant Massey Criminal Justice memes
item.description:
Origin

The Hotstar web series starring Vikrant Massey and Pankaj Tripathi released on Apr 4, 2019. Vikrant Massey’s visible confusion in one of the scenes was the perfect meme material for twitter users.

item.title: Week 007 - Kalank Trailer, Vikrant Massey and lots of Kamal
item.description:
The Modi biopic may have been postponed but this newsletter is not. Till last week I had no idea Vineet Sharda existed but his speech made Kamal the new Gucci Gang.

He’s not the only meme debutant this week as Vikrant Massey is in too. To balance the scales, Kalank, the Karan Johar movie and nepotism extravaganza dropped its trailer this week.

item.title: Malinga No Ball memes
item.description:
Origin

In the Royal Challengers Bangalore (RCB) vs. Mumbai Indians (MI) on Mar 28 2019 at the M.Chinnaswamy Stadium, Bengaluru, MI won in the last over. With 7 runs required from the last ball, Malinga bowled what looked like a no-ball but wasn’t called by the umpires.

item.title: Mission Shakti memes
item.description:
Origin

On Mar 27, 2019, Narendra Modi made an address to the nation to declare that India had developed an anti-satellite missile codenamed Mission Shakti.

item.title: Anushka Sharma Back memes
item.description:
Origin

On Mar 29, 2019. Anushka Sharma tweeted an image from a photoshoot holding her lower back in a black gown. That’s all it took for Twitter users to troll her for having back pain.

item.title: Week 006 - RCB, Anushka Sharma, Mission Shakti
item.description: Election season is upon us and so is the IPL. Yet somehow Anushka Sharma managed to creep in with a surprise entry.

item.title: Main Bhi Chowkidar memes
item.description:
Origin

Narendra Modi launched his campaign for the 2019 elections with the tagline “Main Bhi Chowkidar” to which the opposition replied “Chowkidar Hi Chor Hai”.

item.title: Vivek Oberoi as Modi memes
item.description:
Origin

The trailer for Vivek Oberoi’s movie PM Narendra Modi released on Mar 20, 2019. Bollywood and politics coming together is the perfect recipe for memes.

item.title: Ashwin Mankad memes
item.description:
Origin

On Mar 25, 2019, in the IPL match between King’s XI Punjab and Rajasthan Royals, Ashwin, the KXIP captain pulled a ‘Mankad’ on Jos Butler which led to a huge social media storm.

item.title: Week 005 - Mankading, Chowkidar, Vivek Oberoi as Modi
item.description: If this post goes up later than usual I blame India for destroying the satellite handling my internet connection. Modi is back in the news with an address to the nation after taking a brief step back thanks to IPL. Let’s recap this week.

item.title: Kalank Teaser memes
item.description:
Origin

The Kalank teaser released on Mar 12, 2019. A couple of dialogues is all it took to provide all the necessary fodder for memes.

item.title: Anil Kapoor Age memes
item.description:
Origin

Anil Kapoor shared a pic with the cast of the movie, Malang on Twitter in which he looks younger than his much-younger co-stars.

item.title: Akash Ambani Wedding memes
item.description:
Origin

Mukesh Ambani’s son Akash got married to Shloka Mehta on Mar 09, 2019.

item.title: Week 004 - Ambani Wedding 2.0, Anil Kapoor and Kalank Teaser
item.description: This week the wedding of the richest Indian’s son made a splash and we wonder how old Anil Kapoor really is.

item.title: Sasural Simar Ka Curtain Scene memes
item.description:
Origin

Twitter user @ndreamon shared a clip from Sasural Simar Ka on Mar 09, 2019 which shows all of Indian TV drama overacting in 7 seconds.

item.title: Nehru steals Rafale files memes
item.description:
Origin

Prime Minister Narendra Modi and other BJP leaders have, in the past, blamed a lot of the current problems India faces on the first Prime Minister, Jawaharlal Nehru.

item.title: Akshay Kumar Fire Stunt memes
item.description:
Origin

Akshay Kumar shared images from the promotional event for his new series on Amazon Prime Video titled ‘The End’ on Mar 05, 2019. The actor who is known for his daredevil stunts in movies might have gone a bit too far this time as he set himself on fire.

item.title: Week 003 - Soap Operas, Akshay Kumar and Nehru
item.description: This week, the dramatic overacting in Indian TV show, Sasural Simar Ka steals the limelight while Akshay Kumar set himself on fire to promote his next endeavour.

item.title: GD Bakshi - Yeh Koi Randikhana Hai? memes
item.description:
Origin

Major General GD Bakshi spoke at the Indoi Analytics Conclave held at Constitution Club on Jan 14, 2019. In an epic rant against Pakistani soldiers entering Indian territory, he screamed “Yeh koi randi khana hai?” (translation: Is this some brothel?)

item.title: How's the Josh memes
item.description:
Origin

In the movie Uri: The Surgical Strike, starring Vicky Kaushal and Yami Gautam, Vicky while leading a surgical strikes mission asks his troops, “How’s the josh?” to which his team replies “High, Sir!”

item.title: Malhari GIF
item.description: Origin The gif of Ranveer Singh dancing among Maratha soldiers is taken from the video Malhari from the movie Bajirao Mastani. The gif from Malhari has become a popular ‘celebration’ among the reddit and especially the bitcoin community. As /u/Oracle_of_Knowledge mentions in this comment On Bitcoinity.com when there is a new milestone All Time High they will often post a gif. A gif of this (1:26 in the video, his re-entrance) was up on Bitconity for the $4000 USD all time high.

item.title: Week 002 - How's the Josh, Malhari and GD Bakshi
item.description: This week we look at the Indian Air Force strike on Balakot, Donald Trump dancing like Ranveer Singh, and GD Bakshi.

item.title: Kangana Ranaut riding a Fake Horse in Manikarnika memes
item.description:
Origin

Twitter user @twinitisha shared a behind the scenes video from the shoot of Kangana Ranaut movie Manikarnika showing her riding a mechanical horse in a war scene.

item.title: Rajinikanth Beyond Science in 2.0 memes
item.description:
Origin

In the Tamil movie, 2.0 starring Rajinikanth, the sequel to Enthiran (2010), Rajinikanth says “This is beyond science”.

item.title: Akshay Kumar in Kesari Trailer memes
item.description:
Origin

The trailer for Akshay Kumar and Parineeti Chopra starrer Kesari released on Feb 20, 2019 and as is common these days, it was followed by a spate of memes. The line “Chal Jhootha” (translation: Dream on!) by Akshay Kumar became the common punchline for these memes.

item.title: Week 001 - Kesari Trailer, Rajinikanth, Kangana Ranaut
item.description: This week we look at the Akshay Kumar starrer Kesari, and more.

item.title: Alia Bhatt in Gully Boy memes
item.description:
Origin

The trailer for Ranveer Singh and Alia Bhatt starrer Gully Boy released on Jan 09, 2019. As is common these days, screen captures with dialogues have become fodder for memes. This was no exception.
